      • getRelatedItemsPopup

        public static JBPopup getRelatedItemsPopup(java.util.List<? extends GotoRelatedItem> items,
                                           java.lang.String title,
                                           boolean showContainingModules)
        Returns navigation popup that shows list of related items from items list
        Parameters:
        showContainingModules - Whether the popup should show additional information that aligned at the right side of the dialog.
        It's usually a module name or library name of corresponding navigation item.
        false by default
